column1: Jhalu is a town and a nagar panchayat in Bijnor district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
Jhalu is located at 29.35°N 78.25°E﻿ / 29.35; 78.25. It has an average elevation of 225 metres (738 feet).

column3: 701. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Jhalu has an average literacy rate of 76%
column4: now above  than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 53%
column5: and female literacy is 38%. In Jhalu
column6: 19% of the population is under 6 years of age. For info please contact to Mr Mehfooz Ahmad Siddiqui.
